Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #71 buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial. 

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to utility maintenance at Commercial/103rd.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Ardmore
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted near Broadway/Ardmore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Broadway, Bryn Mawr, Sheridan, Devon, and resume normal route: due to street blockage near Broadway/Ardmore.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Reroute at 18th/Racine
ShortDescription: #18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 18th Street, Racine, Cermak, Ashland, and 18th Street due to street blockage near 18th/ Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 8th Street, Racine, Cermak, Ashland, and 18th Street over to regular route due to street blockage near 18th/Racine 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark and #152 Addison Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison.
ShortDescription: 22 Clark and 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to a Cubs game near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark and #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to a Cubs game near Clark/Addison.

#22 Clark buses will operate via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark.

#152 Addison buses will operate via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Ashland
ShortDescription: 70 buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Damen, Chicago Avenue, Ashland and Division due to police activity near Division/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Damen, Chicago Avenue, Ashland, Division and over regular route due to police activity near Division/Ashland. 

Allow extra travel time.
